title: The Cruise Ship Confessions
description: Mags finds herself abruptly single for the first time in over a year right before spring break. What’s a girl going to do when a catastrophe strikes? Head on a cruise ship adventure with her best friend, of course. Sail along with Mags and Cali as they take the Caribbean by storm mending a broken heart one tequila shot and wild excursion at a time. The Cruise Ship Confessions is a multi-part romantic comedy about two best friends and their first big adventure together in college. The Cruise Ship Confessions is a spinoff of Kristen Hope Mazzola’s award-winning Crashing Series.The Cruise Ship Confessions is the first episode series in the Vacation Confessions by Kristen Hope Mazzola.
